nodes.text: EPHEMERIS droids was a series of multi-tasking droids used by the Eternal Empire of Zakuul. Combining the mathematical features of First-degree droids, administrative functions of Third-degree droids and combat capabilities of Fourth-degree droids, EPHEMERIS droids were used to run the Star Fortresses, a series of battlestation placed in orbit of multiple galactic worlds following the Eternal Empire conquest.
EPHEMERIS droids appear in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire during the Star Fortess series of missions.
